effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.platinum: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or become paralyzed.
flavor_text.platinum: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or become paralyzed.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or become paralyzed.
